definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: "More than in other years?" Nekhludoff asked.
sentences.chinese: “難道比往年多嗎？”聶赫留朵夫問。

sentences.english: The speech this year is more emotionally-charged.
sentences.chinese: 今年的演講，比往年更爲熱情。

sentences.english: A new model will come out this summer.
sentences.chinese: 往年炎天將有新的型號問世。

sentences.english: Snow blankets a ski resort in Arosa, Switzerland. Early snow has al …
sentences.chinese: 提前降臨的雪季讓瑞士的滑雪期比往年早一個月開始。

sentences.english: Abortion, as ever, will be a big electoral issue in the coming campaign.
sentences.chinese: 和往年一樣，墜胎仍將是本次選舉中一個重要議題。

sentences.english: Workers will build the new road at the end of this year .
sentences.chinese: 工人們將會在往年年末把這條新的路途修睦。

sentences.english: Last year, I remember when one of my roommates met her Romeo.
sentences.chinese: 我還記得往年當我的一個舍友碰到她的羅密歐的情景。

sentences.english: Spring flowers have come out earlier than usual this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年春天的花開得比往年早。

sentences.english: Mother gave us the green light to go on the camping trip this summer.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽答應我們往年炎天去野營一次。

sentences.english: Parched fields mean they will have to buy in more feed than they'd like.
sentences.chinese: 天干地旱意味着，他們要比往年儲備更多飼料。

sentences.english: Tom was one of the brightest boys in the year, with supportive parents .
sentences.chinese: 湯姆在父母的支持下，曾是往年最聰明的孩子之一。

sentences.english: BEIJING - The warm spring weather came later than usual this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年的春天比往年來得晚。

sentences.english: The manager said the project would be completed by the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 司理說這項方案將在往年年末完成。

sentences.english: Spring will be a backward season this year, for the weather has all along been so cold.
sentences.chinese: 今年的春季會較往年來得晚，因爲天氣一直還這麼冷。

sentences.english: You will find a record of all the past years' celebrations of the IDD here too.
sentences.chinese: 你也會找到關於往年國際民主節慶祝會的記錄。

sentences.english: I call Li old big. toyear25.

definition: the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
